Availability: Reward Points can be redeemed for:\n * Promoting Your Selling Items\n * Creating Tags On Map\n Reward Points can be gained from:\n *Each new signup with your referral code will reward both of you 50 points. *Each dollar transaction via app, including buying and selling, will reward you 1 point.
• Promoting Your Selling Items\n\n• Creating Tags On Map • Your payment will be released to the seller once you click "Release Payment" button.\n\n• The seller has the option to dispute after 5 days of no reaction from you. Reward Points can be gained from: • Each new signup with your referral code will reward both of you 50 points.\n\n• Each dollar transaction via app, including buying and selling, will reward you 1 point. For security reasons, we need the following to verify your identity. We do not store your information.
Transaction Policy Highlights:
Funds are immediately released upon pickup Confirmation
Funds are automatically released within 5 days of purchase (in-person pickup option)or 5 days after delivery confirmation (shipped option)
Refund Policy Highlights:
Refunds can be requested within 5 days of purchase, before the item is picked up
Items are non-refundable once pickup is confirmed
Shipped items can be returned within 5 days of delivery only if they are defective or materially different from description
DO NOT hand the item to the buyer without receiving pickup Confirmation
Funds are immediately released upon pickup Confirmation
Funds are automatically released within 5 days of purchase (in-person pickup option) or 5 days after delivery confirmation (shipped option)
Refund Policy Highlights:
Refunds should be approved if requested within 5 days of purchase, before the item is picked up
Items are non-refundable once pickup is confirmed
Shipped items can be returned within 5 days of delivery only if they are defective or materially different from description
You can open a dispute if the seller declines your refund request or does not respond within 5 days.
Refunl̥d Policy Highlights:
Refunds should be approved if requested within 5 days of purchase, before the item is picked up
Items are non-refundable once pickup is confirmed
Shipped items can be returned within 5 days of delivery only if they are defective or materially different from description
You have 5 days to respond the refund request. You may want to contact the buyer directly first.
Refund Policy Highlights:
Refunds should be approved if requested within 5 days of purchase, before the item is picked up
Items are non-refundable once pickup is confirmed
̥Shipped items can be returned within 5 days of delivery only if they are defective or materially different from description
======= PENDING PICKUP CONFIRMATION\n(in-person pickup option):\nYour money is released after the buyer ‘Confirms’ pickup. Do not hand the product over until you receive confirmation. After you receive the item, please release payment to the seller. Awaiting payment confirmation from the buyer. Ask the buyer to release payment once the item has been delivered.
You accept the Refund Request\nIMPORTANT: Make sure you receive the correct item before releasing the refund accepts your refund request IMPORTANT: Make sure the seller releases refund when returning the item requested a refund. If you \"Accept\", you may request the return of your item before releasing refund to the buyer. You have requested a refund. Please wait for the seller\'s response. Accept Refund Request You have submitted the dispute statement, please wait for admins’ decision Submit Response Accept Refund opened a dispute. You have 3 days to submit your response to the dispute or accept the refund request. opened a dispute. You have 3 days to submit your response to the dispute or release the payment to the seller. You declined the refund request. Please wait for the buyer\'s response. You will have the option to dispute after 3 days of no response from the buyer. You have not responded to refund request within 5 days Cancel Refund decline your refund request due to the following reason: Do you want to request a refund? You may need to return the item if requested by the seller. We encourage you to contact the seller first. Confirm Payment I confirm that the item is as described and agree to release the payment Do you want to cancel the refund request? Do you want to cancel the dispute request? Do you want to accept the refund request? Confirm Refund Do you want to release the refund?
